name: Super Monkey Land (nicktodorov)
description:
This is my first try to create games and use GB Studio, Tiled, Gimp, etc. 

The levels are being designed by my 14y old daughter and I am dealing with the rest of the development. Currently we have completed two levels and we are working on to extend the game and make it complete.

We wanted to create a platformer similar to the Mario series, but picked a monkey character and so we made this game of words in the title and the game logo.

Game is being made mainly to be played on Game Boy consoles, but we added also the browser play option.

For best game experience, please download the rom and play it on your favourite handheld console.
